text: High Infidelity is a 1964 Italian French comedy movie directed by Mario Monicelli, Elio Petri, Franco Rossi, Luciano Salce and starring Nino Manfredi, Fulvia Franco, John Phillip Law, Charles Aznavour, Claire Bloom, Jean-Pierre Cassel. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mario Monicelli Category:Movies directed by Elio Petri Category:Movies directed by Franco Rossi Category:Movies directed by Luciano Salce
title: High Infidelity
